text: mariyu ibrahim tana tandri ksamapana koraku prarthincindi kevalam atanu atadi (tana tandri)to cesina vagdanam vallane. Kani ataniki, atadu (tana tandri) niscayanga allah ku satruvani spastamainappudu, atanu (ibrahim) atadini vidanadadu. Vastavaniki ibrahim vinaya vidheyatalato (allah nu) arthincevadu, sahanasiludu
